member.name: T:MadMilkman.Ini.IniCommentStarter

member.summary: Use ';' as comment's starting character.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniCommentStarter.Hash

member.name: T:MadMilkman.Ini.IniDuplication
member.summary: Defines a behaviour for duplicate occurences.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniDuplication.Allowed
member.summary: Allow duplicate names in .

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniDuplication.Disallowed
member.summary: Disallow duplicate names in .
member.remarks: is thrown on duplicate name occurence.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniDuplication.Ignored
member.summary: Ignore duplicate names.
member.remarks: Prevents adding or inserting an if its name already exists in .

member.name: T:MadMilkman.Ini.IniKeyDelimiter
member.summary: Defines key's name and value delimiter character.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniKeyDelimiter.Equal
member.summary: Use '=' as key's name and value delimiter character.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniKeyDelimiter.Colon
member.summary: Use ':' as key's name and value delimiter character.

member.name: T:MadMilkman.Ini.IniSectionWrapper
member.summary: Defines section's wrapper characters around its name.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniSectionWrapper.SquareBrackets
member.summary: Use '[' and ']' as section's wrapper characters.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniSectionWrapper.AngleBrackets
member.summary: Use '<' and '>' as section's wrapper characters.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniSectionWrapper.CurlyBrackets
member.summary: Use '{' and '}' as section's wrapper characters.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniSectionWrapper.Parentheses
member.summary: Use '(' and ')' as section's wrapper characters.

member.name: T:MadMilkman.Ini.IniFile
member.summary: In-memory representation of an INI file.

remarks.para: is a central class of MadMilkman.Ini component.
To define an INI file's format use object.
To load (read) an INI file from a file's path or a stream use IniFile.Load methods.
To save (write) an INI file to a file's path or a stream use IniFile.Save methods.
To view INI file's structure representation see IniFile's Content Hierarchy Diagram.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of class.
member.param: object that defines INI file's format, settings for both Load and Save methods.

member.name: M:MadMilkman.Ini.IniKey.IsSupportedValueType(System.Type)
member.summary: Indicates whether the can be converted to specified type.
member.param: Type of the object to convert the to.
member.returns: if the specified type is supported.
member.remarks:
Currently supported types are:
System.Boolean
System.Byte
System.SByte
System.Int16
System.UInt16
System.Int32
System.UInt32
System.Int64
System.UInt64
System.Char
System.Single
System.Double
System.Decimal
System.DateTime
System.TimeSpan
System.Enum
System.String
Additionally both Array and List of the above types are supported.

member.name: M:MadMilkman.Ini.IniKey.TryParseValue``1(``0@)
member.summary: Converts the to an instance of the specified type.
member.param: Uninitialized instance of a specific type which will hold the converted value if the conversion succeeds.
member.typeparam: Type of the object to convert the to.
member.returns: Value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.

remarks.para: For supported types see the remarks of method.
Mapped value results in have priority over parsing the value.

member.typeparam: Type of the objects in array to convert the to.
member.returns: Value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.

remarks.para: For supported types see the remarks of method.
Mapped value results in have priority over parsing the value.

member.name: T:MadMilkman.Ini.IniSection
member.summary: Represents a section item of the INI file with name and keys content.

member.name: F:MadMilkman.Ini.IniSection.GlobalSectionName
member.summary: Represents a section name which is used to define a global section, used for storing first keys series that don't belong to any section.

remarks.para: If a section with this name is located as a first file's section then its name and comments are ignored. If a section with this name isn't located as first file's section then it will be written with MADMILKMAN_INI_FILE_GLOBAL_SECTION name.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:MadMilkman.Ini.IniOptions.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets encoding for reading and writing an INI file.
member.remarks: Value should not be , if it is then a default Encoding.ASCII value will be used.

member.name: P:MadMilkman.Ini.IniOptions.CommentStarter
member.summary: Gets or sets comments starting character.

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating if file's size is reduced.
If file is decompressed on Load and compressed on Save.
Gets or sets an INI file's protection password.
File is decrypted on Load and encrypted on Save if a password is not or .

member.name: T:MadMilkman.Ini.IniValueBinding
member.summary: Represents a class that is used for binding operations, an operation in which the placeholder keys values are replaced with an internal or external data.

remarks.para: can be accessed through property.
Binding can be executed with internal data source or with a provided external data source.
For more information see IniKey's Value Binding.

member.summary: Executes a binding operation with external data source, only on specified section.
member.param: The binding data source.

member.name: M:MadMilkman.Ini.IniValueMappings.Add``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Adds a new mapping of to resulting object of parse methods.
member.param: The key's value.
The object that represents parsed .
member.typeparam: Type of the object that represents parsed .

remarks.para: The key's value cannot be .
The mapped result's type must be one of the supported types for parsing, see the remarks of method.
Collection cannot contain multiple entries of same key's value, value comparison is case-insensitive.

member.name: M:MadMilkman.Ini.IniValueMappings.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a mapping for a specified key's value in the collection.
member.param: The key's value to remove in the collection.
member.returns: if a mapping for a specified key's value is successfully found and removed.
